name: example-spa
description: An example OAuth-secured SPA that uses an API-driven backend for frontend
author: Curity AB

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.html app.css config.json dist/
scripts.start: npm run clean && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' webpack serve --config webpack/webpack.dev.ts
scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.ts
